name: SmarteriKettle30andCoffee20
0:
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen Kettle”
”Alexa, set Kitchen kettle to 170 degrees”
”Alexa, turn off Kitchen Kettle”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Reinvent your kitchen with Smarter!

Control the new generation of Smarter products using Alexa! 

Add the skill, link the skill with your Smarter account and ask Alexa to search for devices, with "Alexa, discover my devices".

Control your device with the name you gave it in the Smarter app.

Use commands such as:

"Alexa, turn on the <kettle name>"
"Alexa, turn off the <kettle name>"
"Alexa, set the <kettle name> temperature to 120 degrees" (watch the temperature change in the app!)
"Alexa, what is the temperature of the <kettle name>?"
